summary: The genus *Homo* includes modern humans (*Homo sapiens*) and our extinct ancestors. It evolved from *Australopithecus* around 2 million years ago with the appearance of *Homo habilis*. *Homo erectus* was a successful species that spread across Africa and Eurasia. Modern humans emerged in Africa and later spread worldwide, interbreeding with other human species like Neanderthals. These ancient human species are now extinct, with the last of them disappearing around 40,000 years ago.
title: Homo
